Error_NoFrequency: First you have to enter a radio frequency. <color=#939393>/{0}</color>
Error_Syntax: The frequency must be an integer between 1 and 9999.
Error_NoItem: You must have a radio in your inventory
Msg_Syntax:
/{0} frequency (or f) : choose frequency
/{0} off : disabled radio
Msg_ActiveItem: When you hold the radio in your hands, it will automatically reactivate.
